ygData.msgSnippet: ... No idea, bascially from my meager xp with it, u will acceralate the healing by 2. eg, when u sit down,u heal at the rate of 2hp per cycle. it will kinda be
ygData.messageBody:
LKW wrote:

> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> There isn't many healing spells for spell casters, esp for Wiz, who
> specialize purely on offensive spells. This is actually a big bad point for
> wiz. I noticed we wiz have the ability to learn bind wound skill - our
> ONLY source of self-healing. So far I never train on it as I do not have
> much money to spend on bandages (this skill required bandages).
>
> If anyone train on this skill, pls share ya experience:
> - What's the sucessful rate when you start to train in this skill?

No idea, bascially from my meager xp with it, u will acceralate the healing
by 2. eg, when u sit down,u heal at the rate of 2hp per cycle. it will kinda be
like around 3hp per cycle with bind (?). Troll heals 4hp per cycle when
sitting. and this bind wound accerating applies only up to 50% of ur hp.


>
> - At the begining stage, I believe I will fail many times. May I know if I
> fail, what's the implication? Does failure means heal less or the bandage
> is totally wasted and heal nothing at all?

No idea on this.


>
> - So far I didnt anyhow use my practice point. I think I have around
> 35points balance at lvl 8. To minimise the cost of bandage, is it
> advisable to throw them all into bind wound skill?

Uhm, i would advise u to ask an enchanter to summon some bandages for u. at
5sp plus a pop it's too expensive.


>
> - Can this bind wound skill heal other than self?
>

U can heal others too. Kinda like a medic. heheh



> - What is the healing effect of this skill, does it have a delay time? Eg
> some spells have range damage plus certain points of dam per lvl.
>

As for the delay, it's quite short if I remember it correctly, but u can't
use it in combat.


> - If it's not advisable to use practice points on this skill (maybe these r
> some other skills which is more impt?), how can one rise the skill fast?
>

uhm, u could put some points into it. bascially ur other skills will raise
through constant use.


> - Can wiz use this skill while fighting? Or we must quit for attack mode
> to use this skill?
>

nope, u need to be staying still for it to work. and get the best effect.

> - What is the lvl ceiling of this skill for wiz? 3+3/lvl (like our melee
> skill) or 5+5/lvl (like our magery skill)?
>

no idea,



>
> Thx.
